name: bizarrely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a strange and unusual way: She had been behaving bizarrely for a while. A bizarrely dressed young man approached me.
used when you think a particular fact is strange or unusual: People seem bizarrely unconcerned by security. Bizarrely, a lot of people agree with him. See
bizarre
